expectations.communication: You'll discuss your legal questions during the consultation
expectations.reschedule: You can reschedule or cancel up to 24 hours before the appointment

privacyDescription: All information provided will be kept confidential and used only for the purpose of this consultation.

selectDateTimeFirst: Please select a date and time first

errorRejectingAppointment: Failed to reject appointment. Please try again.

cancelRestriction: You can only cancel up to 2 days before the appointment.
